Package ctlogo.execute.expression.instruction

Interface Instruction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepeatInstruction
    public interface Instruction
    Logo instructions.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul Yang

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default Expression getExpression​(TokenStream ts, ExpressionStream es)
      Get the expression corresponding to the instruction.
      Expression getExpression​(TokenStream ts, ExpressionStream es, boolean isFirst)
      Get the expression corresponding to the instruction.

    • Method Detail

      • getExpression

        Expression getExpression​(TokenStream ts,
                         ExpressionStream es,
                         boolean isFirst)
                  throws CTSyntaxException
        Get the expression corresponding to the instruction.
        Parameters:
        ts - the token stream containing the instruction.
        es - the expression stream managing the token stream
        isFirst - is the instruction appear right after a left-parenthesis
        Returns:
        the corresponsing expression.
        Throws:
        CTSyntaxException - if the syntax is incorrect. The first token to be get from this token stram should be the first token of the instruction, usually the name of the instruction.

      • getExpression

        default Expression getExpression​(TokenStream ts,
                                 ExpressionStream es)
                          throws CTSyntaxException
        Get the expression corresponding to the instruction.
        Parameters:
        ts - the token stream containing the instruction.
        Returns:
        the corresponsing expression. This shall be equivalent to getExpression(ts, es, false), and this is the default implementation of this method.
        Throws:
        CTSyntaxException
